page.title: 14Tal_y_Bont Village
page.content: In our village questionnaire we interviewed 29 people. We split into 3 groups : 1 stayed at the post office, another went to the housing estate & a third went to the older houses in the village. 1.Where do people live? Most in the housing estate or area of Tal_y_Bont 2.Where do you work? Bangor or retired 3.How long have you lived here? Most moved recently, many in last 20 years 4.If you have moved here recently why? Majority due to work in Bangor 5.What changes have you noticed? Population growth since building of estate. 6.Would you change anything,what & why? More facilities for younger children (eg:playground,youth club). 7.Has the new by_pass affected you, how? Roads in village safer & quieter.
